languages.text: "Это — дыхание мороза, что выстужает кости. Это — глухая злоба, рожденная отчаянием. Проклятье, что обрушивается на видевших слишком много и ненавидящих слишком сильно".

traits.locale_text: "Это — дыхание мороза, что выстужает кости. Это — глухая злоба, рожденная отчаянием. Проклятье, что обрушивается на видевших слишком много и ненавидящих слишком сильно".

languages.text: "It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon them who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."
languages.original_text: "Это — дыхание мороза, что выстужает кости. Это — глухая злоба, рожденная отчаянием. Проклятье, что обрушивается на видевших слишком много и ненавидящих слишком сильно".

traits.locale_text: "It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon they who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."
"It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon they who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."

"It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon them who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."

languages.text: « C'est le souffle gelé qui glace les os. C'est la lueur de malveillance née du désespoir. La malédiction qui guette ceux qui en ont trop vu et ceux qui détestent trop passionnément. »
languages.original_text: "It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon them who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le souffle gelé qui glace les os. C'est la lueur de malveillance née du désespoir. La malédiction qui guette ceux qui en ont trop vu et ceux qui détestent trop passionnément. »

languages.text: “是寒冷的气息，让你的骨头结冰。是漆黑的恶意，诞生于无光的绝望之中。是邪恶的诅咒，来自那些见识了太多事情，心中怀着太多怨恨的死者。”
languages.original_text: "It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon them who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."

traits.locale_text: “是寒冷的气息，让你的骨头结冰。是漆黑的恶意，诞生于无光的绝望之中。是邪恶的诅咒，来自那些见识了太多事情，心中怀着太多怨恨的死者。”

languages.text: 「骨を凍らせるのは霜の息吹。絶望から生まれた光のない悪意。多くのものを見過ぎ、心を憎しみで燃やした者たちを捕らえて喰らう呪いだ」
languages.original_text: "It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon them who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."

traits.locale_text: 「骨を凍らせるのは霜の息吹。絶望から生まれた光のない悪意。多くのものを見過ぎ、心を憎しみで燃やした者たちを捕らえて喰らう呪いだ」

languages.text: "Der Atem des Frosts, der bis ins Mark geht. Eine lichtlose Bosheit, geboren aus Verzweiflung. Der Fluch, der denen auflauert, die zu viel erlebt haben und mit zu großem Herz hassen."
languages.original_text: "It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon them who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."

traits.locale_text: "Der Atem des Frosts, der bis ins Mark geht. Eine lichtlose Bosheit, geboren aus Verzweiflung. Der Fluch, der denen auflauert, die zu viel erlebt haben und mit zu großem Herz hassen."

languages.text: «Es el hálito escarchado que hiela los huesos. Es la oscura malicia que nace de la desesperación. La maldición que cae sobre quienes han visto demasiado y odian con demasiada vehemencia».
languages.original_text: "It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon them who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."

traits.locale_text: «Es el hálito escarchado que hiela los huesos. Es la oscura malicia que nace de la desesperación. La maldición que cae sobre quienes han visto demasiado y odian con demasiada vehemencia».

languages.text: "Öyle bir kederdir ki bu, insanın iliklerine işleyen soğuğun nefesidir. Biçarelikten doğan, ışıktan yoksun bir garazdır. Gereğinden fazlasını görüp geçirenleri ve yürekten nefret duyanları av bellemiş bir lanettir."
languages.original_text: "It is the breath of the frost that chills the bones. It is lightless malice born of despair. The curse that preys upon them who have seen too many things and hate with too much heart."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle bir kederdir ki bu, insanın iliklerine işleyen soğuğun nefesidir. Biçarelikten doğan, ışıktan yoksun bir garezdir. Gereğinden fazlasını görüp geçirenleri ve yürekten nefret duyanları av bellemiş bir lanettir."
